channel.title: [Suggestion] Enable .log files uploaded on this forum!
channel.description:
Please enable .log files to be uploaded on this forum!
If you have ever used the program HijackThis, then you'll know what I'm talking about. HijackThis will scan your computer, and give you information on your processes, and will tell you if they are bad or good or whatever, but if you want to show your logfile here you have to do other things.
So why not just enable .log files. Thank you if you can. :)
~Ron :rolleyes:

item.title: [Suggestion] Enable .log files uploaded on this forum!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Yeah but you could just add .log files so we wouldn't have to.

Read full topic
item.source: [Suggestion] Enable .log files uploaded on this forum!

I could I guess, but like white castle said you could just change them to .txt
